entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Low 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers near midnight. Rain beginning after midnight. Risk of a thunderstorm late this evening and after midnight. Low 10. Forecast issued 11:17 PM PDT Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Friday: Rain. High 12.
entry.summary: Rain ending early in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High 12. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:17 PM PDT Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 7. POP 60%
